name: Souljoined
description:
Souljoined

You are a spirit lost deep in an ancient maze, with nothing but a host body you can stumble around in. Luckily, chests containing more host bodies are scattered throughout the maze, just waiting for you to souljoin with them! Souljoining with a host adds it to your network, allowing you to possess it at any time, even sharing its health with your other hosts! Unfortunately, you are only strong enough to possess one host at a time, and all other hosts in your network will walk forwards on autopilot. Good luck escaping the maze!

Instructions
[W] -- Move faster (not by much)
[A] & [D] -- Turn left & right
[S] -- Dodge backwards in an emergency
[Space] -- Possess a different host you have souljoined to.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam. First time trying a proper game jam, pretty happy with what I managed to accomplish in 2 days. Made as a team with Jake, Will, and Tom :)

Will update after the jam to round the game off properly (didn't get to add everything we wanted).
